item.title: BBC Verify: How much has the US spent on aid to Ukraine?
item.description: US President Donald Trump claims the US has outspent Europe on aid to Ukraine by over $200bn. BBC Verify's Nick Eardley fact-checks Trump's claims.

item.title: US Supreme Court orders new trial for Oklahoma death row inmate Richard Glossip
item.description: Glossip has had nine execution dates postponed, and eaten his "last meal" three times.

item.title: Claims of white genocide 'not real', South African court rules
item.description: Donald Trump has been raising the alarm over the number of white farmers killed in the country.

item.title: Uganda probes death of Nigerian footballer in shopping mall
item.description: Abubakar Lawal, 29, reportedly fell from a third-floor balcony of a shopping mall in Kampala.

item.title: Regrets, executions and coups: Four takeaways from former Nigerian military ruler's book
item.description: Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida, known as IBB, has got Nigeria talking about the past and what might have been.
